snippet: A survey of purchasing managers at manufacturers across India, released on Monday, showed them to be at their gloomiest since March 2009.
abstract: Indian rupee begins slipping lower in currency markets again after two-day respite, as further signs emerge of broad troubles in India's economy; survey of purchasing managers at manufacturers shows them to be at their gloomiest since March 2009.
lead_paragraph: A survey of purchasing managers at manufacturers across India, released on Monday, showed them to be at their gloomiest since March 2009.

headline.main: Rupee Continues Decline on New Evidence of Weakness in Indian Economy
headline.print_headline: Rupee Continues Decline on New Evidence of Weakness in Indian Economy
